website_summaries.verdict: Except for Galaxy compatibility, the Samsung Level On doesn't offer anything you won't find in other, better on-ear headphones for the same price.
pros: The Samsung Level On on-ear headphones earn some points for their decent bass response, their folding design and removable cable
cons: They're burdened with plasticky build quality and a lack of clarity in the high end
The in-line remote only works properly with Samsung Galaxy phones and tablets

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, but easily broken.
customer_reviews.text: They had great sound but cracked on both sides above the folding hinge two days ago, after about 5 months of normal use. Now I'm guessing that the problem of the break is because of head size. I've go a larger noggin (23 inches / 7 3/8ths hat) which means they are not a one size fits all headphone.
customer_reviews.author: Evan Solana-Cardona

customer_reviews.title: Remote Does not work w Apple prods!
customer_reviews.text: I use headphone for at least 2 hours daily on my commute. I go thru about a pair every 1-2 years. So far this has been great. Sound quality and fit is great. I wish i had checked the Samsung/Apple compatibility issues (my fault) for the mic and volume remote. Annoying but not a deal breaker. I'll update when/if the headphone dies. UPDATE - a few months in - the jack connector started cracking, causing sound dropouts. However, since the wire is detachable (a very smart move), I'll spend $6 on a new wire vs. a lot more for a whole new headphone.
customer_reviews.author: Axisoevil

customer_reviews.title: So far so good, Sound quality is exceptional and meet above my ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, Sound quality is exceptional and meet above my expectations. However it is somewhat delicate of a device so consider maybe handling with care on a constant level. I've had many try them on and used them for different mediums and all have been wow! by the sound level and overall performance of these headphones. I've purchase a total of three because they are that good.
customer_reviews.author: Sam's Hand Crafted Roses

customer_reviews.title: Beware of weak spot... will crack
customer_reviews.text: I have not had this headset for a year and it has already broken. This isn't the first headset of these I've had, and the break occurs in about the same area. There is a weak spot near the ear piece. I would only get another pair of these if they were under $10 or it had a 2 year warranty or insurance.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney Stowell

customer_reviews.title: These are nice....
customer_reviews.text: These are nice, but not as nice as they could be. When used with a Samsung phone, the audio comes out very "stereo" sounding. When used with an Ipod or other device, that sound is not there and the audio comes out ALMOST pure. Personally, I don't think these are worth the money, but they aren't bad so I choose to keep them. These headphones will hurt your head after 3 hours of use, so keep that in mind.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Hanson

customer_reviews.title: These are amazing. I bought three pairs for my teens and ...
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing. I bought three pairs for my teens and they sound as good or better than Beats, Bose and the Sony headphones that all cost far more. My kids all find them comfortable and I've heard zero complaints about the sound quality and my kids are pretty discriminating when it comes to technology. Listen to them at Best Buy (where I bought two of the pairs) and compare them to the more expensive headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Alchemy1966

customer_reviews.title: Very good headphones they sound good they look and feel like ...
customer_reviews.text: Very good headphones they sound good they look and feel like quality headphones and they also come with a nice carrying case. My only complaint is that i find they are a little uncomfortable after wearing them for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Steele

customer_reviews.title: Best value headphones
customer_reviews.text: Best value headphones. Good isolation and sound. Comfortable earpads and good fit. the bass is a little weak but overall it delivers crisp and balanced sound. comes with detachable cable, mic, and protection case, all for around $50 (like new condition).
customer_reviews.author: Muller25

customer_reviews.title: Well made and sounds good.
customer_reviews.text: Based on the reviews I was concerned that they were going to be overwhelmingly bass-y. Way more balanced than I expected. Not too heavy and about as comfortable as headphones get.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew C.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought them for my son as a gift and he absolutely loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Overall great sound. Needed an equalizer app to balance excessive base.
customer_reviews.author: Ze Bargain Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones, Came a day early, couldn't be any more satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan M

customer_reviews.title: Headphones
customer_reviews.text: Got the package today earlier then expected... Thank you and everything was ok... And sure ill be making new ones soon...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 5mm audio cable is of substandard quality and will probably need to be replaced because it breaks easily. All else is
customer_reviews.text: The 3.5mm audio cable is of substandard quality and will probably need to be replaced because it breaks easily. All else is great
customer_reviews.author: Richard Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Padding is not good ears will hurt after an hour or so
customer_reviews.text: Sound is pretty good but after wearing them for an hour or more your ears will hurt because the padding is terrible
customer_reviews.author: allan b.

customer_reviews.title: cant believe i was taken advantage of!!!
customer_reviews.text: The headphones were horrible on the right side the speakers were blown and i dont k how these headphones made it out of the warehouse like this!!! Also i lost the receipt so im stuck with them. I will not go thru this again!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sharkeedee

customer_reviews.title: Great headsets but they didn't work for what we wanted ...
customer_reviews.text: Great headsets but they didn't work for what we wanted to use them. We found out that you need more than bluetooth compatibility to make headsets or any other device to work with another. We have an LG 4K television and we wanted headsets to listen to movies and not disturb the whole house. Well you need to look for headsets with "lg sync" compatibility for them to work and the same goes for a soundbar. Just being bluetooth doesn't guarantee they will work.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Marie Grandberry Sawyer

customer_reviews.title: Wired
customer_reviews.text: Seu confusing. I thought it was wireless but this is the wired version. Very pricy for wired headphones. Misleading.
customer_reviews.author: Alib

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply Made
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is very good, sound isolation is great, but the headphones can get uncomfortable if you wear glasses. UPDATE: The headphones are cheaply made (full plastic headband without any type of metal support) and broke after 6 months of regular use. Unacceptable for a $70 pair of headphones.
customer_reviews.author: K. Ulmer

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones they are not very loud as the beats ...
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones they are not very loud as the beats but they do the job and the mic is great
customer_reviews.author: adalberto

customer_reviews.title: Good sounding headphones but they do not fit over the ...
customer_reviews.text: Good sounding headphones but they do not fit over the ear just on them which irritates the ears if listening for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Roguekayaks

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this product. It was shipped quickly and no damage. Very happy with the results
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great work guys. I got what i needed and i love my headphones. Will recommend to friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Frankie Pagan

customer_reviews.title: Utterly Shocked by Results!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these headphones in Like New condition and I use an iPhone 6. I have to say that I have never been happier with the way I spent my money. I only paid $47 dollars, and these headphones sound just as good as my Beats by Dre Solo's. I would recommend these headphones to anyone who want quality without paying too much money. These are also extremely comfortable and I can wear them on my head for hours at a time. Buy these!!
customer_reviews.author: Rahim Williams

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy. Buy Skullcandy Bluetooth Headphones instead.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because I originally thought they were Bluetooth, so I returned them and lost money in the process (not free to return ship).
customer_reviews.author: David Gardiner

customer_reviews.title: great headphones, took mine 4 years for the bands to break
customer_reviews.text: I use mine to work out and they eventuallly about 3-4 years later to break,.... yea it does seem like the plastic would break if you do not take care of them.
customer_reviews.author: anselmo

customer_reviews.title: ... got a pair of these and I was very satisfied with them but the most disappointing part of the ...
customer_reviews.text: I got a pair of these and I was very satisfied with them but the most disappointing part of the whole thing was like many other reviews that from regular wear it will break... I was not rough with mine and they broke within 3 months
customer_reviews.author: Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Compatible with Beats Solo BUT inline controls only work with Samsung phones
customer_reviews.text: Excellent fit headphones with good sound quality that is compatible with Beats Solo BUT inline controls only work with Samsung phones. This is not an issue with the Beats Solo and thus the just okay rating.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Very loud and remarkable sound quality.
customer_reviews.text: The build quality is also great. I love the details and the case.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Gold Faced

customer_reviews.title: wow... tired of some huge confusing line ...
customer_reviews.text: wow...tired of some huge confusing line up from other brands, these are a solid choice. clear reproduction.
customer_reviews.author: edie

customer_reviews.title: Broken headband
customer_reviews.text: Headband broke after warranty expired and could not find replacement parts
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: A "Huge" Letdown
customer_reviews.text: A "Huge" Letdown. I was really hyped up to get these headphones because of all the positive reviews and considering the original MSRP was $169 but the price was significantly lower now. Other reviewers say they will eventually break down on you. I was willing to take that chance if the sound quality was amazing. Well guess what? These headphones do not sound that great. Some reviewers even said they sounded better than Beats Solo 2. That's a laugh and are probably fake reviews. The bottom line is the Samsung Level On Headphones do not have enough bass, sound tinny, are not loud enough and are prone to mechanical failure.
customer_reviews.author: DualityOfMan

customer_reviews.title: I feel like the build quality should be better for what these ...
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is okay, but after a year of daily use and taking on and off, the plastic is starting to develop hairline cracks all the way around the head band and has even partially cracked around the hinge to the point where I had to repair it. I feel like the build quality should be better for what these MSRP for.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Better than Beats!
customer_reviews.text: *Watch my video review for more information* These headphones I feel are better than the Beats. They have better build quality and they also have better sound. While Beats are solely focussed on delivering bass and miss out on the kids and highs, these headphones deliver amazing sound in bass, mids, AND highs. Samsung does not slack on any component of these headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Eric J. Spencley

customer_reviews.title: Great sound!
customer_reviews.text: I love these samsung headphones! They are lightweight and so comfortable. The ear pads are so soft, i wear them for hours and don't feel any discomfort! The sounds quality is great! I would buy these again!
customer_reviews.author: Diane Cozy

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: got it with purchase of Samsung S6. very rich sound. the best part is, IT DOESN'T HURT MY EARS! I've got Bose and Nakamichi, I do enjoy their sound quality (Nakamichi is better in my opinion), but they hurt my head and ears ruthlessly.
customer_reviews.author: labelee

product_meta.title: Samsung LEVEL-On Premium Stereo Headphones for Smartphones - Retail Packaging - Black
product_meta.description: A true balance of beauty, performance and convenience - the new Samsung Level On folding stereo headphones offer outstanding sound fidelity in a compact, on-the-ear design with foldable earpieces for convenient storage in transit. Designed with a modern, active lifestyle in mind, Level-On is the perfect companion for your smartphone, tablet, laptop, or desktop.
feature_bullets: 40mm Dual Diaphragm audio for natural, clear sound
In-line remote control with volume adjust, play/pause, and skip functions.
Package includes On-Ear Headphones, Premium Carrying Case, Detachable 3.5pi Cable with Integrated Remote and Airplane Adapter

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.6 out of 5 stars75 ratings3.6 out of 5 stars
